messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Alberta Unschooling  Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Are you a member of Unschooling Canada yahoo group?  Cindy posted it there.  It s in Calgary, Sept 09.  It s called Alphabet Soup: Calgary Unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Are you a member of Unschooling Canada yahoo group?  Cindy posted it there.  It's in Calgary, Sept 09.  It's called Alphabet Soup: Calgary Unschooling Conference.  I will post a link to the site as soon as it's up and running!
 
Jodi

--- On Thu, 10/16/08, Laura Beaudin <laura.beaudin@...> wrote:

From: Laura Beaudin <laura.beaudin@...>
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Alberta Unschooling Conference
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, October 16, 2008, 9:43 PM






Whoa! I obviously missed something...

WHO
WHAT
WHERE
and
WHEN?!?

Laura in ALberta

At 02:16 PM 16/10/2008, you wrote:

>thanks Jodi - I will watch for it.
>I mentioned it to the girls and they sounded pretty interested.
>Hope there is something there for shy teenagers and 70 year old great-
>grandmas- ;-) like comfortable chairs-

messages.subject: Re: Alberta Unschooling  Conference
messages.msgSnippet: thanks Jodi - I will watch for it. I mentioned it to the girls and they sounded pretty interested. Hope there is something there for  shy teenagers and 70 year
messages.messageBody:
thanks Jodi - I will watch for it.
I mentioned it to the girls and they sounded pretty interested.
Hope there is something there for shy teenagers and 70 year old great-
grandmas- ;-) like comfortable chairs-

Judy- a lake day sounds great if next September is anything like this
one was here.
Would need someone to follow-havnt driven in Calgary for ten years-
havnt even gone there in about 4.
too much traffic for a rural old gal.
but Logging roads and mountain roads -no problem.
Grace

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Alberta Unschooling  Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Grace: Waving from Calgary too!  Hey, maybe we could do a lake day on the Sunday?  It would still be nice in September. Judy Arnall,  Peaceful Parenting,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Grace:

Waving from Calgary too! Hey, maybe we could do a lake day on the Sunday? It would still be nice in September.

Judy Arnall, Peaceful Parenting, Family and Relationship Expert, Speaker (Professional Member of CAPS) and Author of "Discipline Without Distress: 135 tools for raising caring, responsible children without time-out, spanking, punishment or bribery" www.professionalparenting.ca Tele: (403) 714-6766 Email jarnall@... "Peace In The World Begins In The Home"
----- Original Message -----
From: Jodi Bezzola
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 15, 2008 11:51 AM
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Alberta Unschooling Conference



Hi Grace, I'm glad to meet another Canadian member of the list! The website is in production and will be up and running soon. I'll make sure and post it here as soon as it's ready. I do know the dates are 18-20 Sep 2009.

Jodi

Jodi
